item.description:
Lindsay, who is a friend of mine was selected as a WINNER of a Howl at the Moon Happy Hour Party! She has invited us to join her to enjoy live entertainment, great food, and tons of fun.

Expect a high-energy dueling pianos throwdown where the piano players and staff not only entertain you but if you choose, you can become part of the show too.

Showtime is from 6 PM until 10 PM.

Come sing, dance, and howl the night away as the most versatile and talented musicians perform your favorite songs from the 70's, 80's, 90's, and today on pianos, guitars, and more!

Arrive when you can and stay as long as you're able.

If you RSVP Yes, are at least 21 and arrive between 4 PM and 8 PM you receive:

No cover UNTIL 8 PM HOWEVER if you leave and want to REENTER AFTER 8 PM you MUST PAY a $10 entry fee and if you arrive AFTER 8 PM you MUST PAY a $10 entry fee.

 

$4 Sobieski vodka drinks

$4 Don Q rum drinks

$3 Landshark beer

$5 Rum Punch and Root Beer Floats

Complimentary buffet from 6 PM until 8 PM (so get there early so you can have some grub).

 

If you want to pay for your food and are interested in the drink list here are the Howl Food Menu and Howl Drink Menu

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Nearby subway stations are Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk away

Howl at the Moon Party Terms and Conditions:

You understand that Howl at the Moon does not reserve or allow guests to hold tables. If you are interested in a guaranteed table, there is special party pricing. You understand that these are the privileges for the date specified only. No rights, privileges or drink offers will apply to this Happy Hour Party other than what is stated above. You've read and understand these privileges prior to arriving for our party.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Lindsay's Party and you will get a wrist band that gets you free grub and cheap drinks.
item.name: Let's Howl at the Moon Again
